content: Hi all, I'm planning a Manchu 20th reunion on July 30th thru Aug. 5th at Ft ORD, CA. but I'm not sure how to organize something this big and also come up with the money to finiance it. Heres what I do know: Reunion Name: Manchu 20th Reunion Dates: July 30th - Aug. 5th Who: A 1-9 Ifn Div. (About 80 people or more) Where: Ft. Ord, CA. Main Event: BBQ Saturday Aug. 1st 2009 in front of the old barracks. Golfing on Sunday morning at the Black horse and the Bayonet for those who want to attend. Fishing trip is planned. Please help! Also taking donations: *********(Edited Post( No solicitation for donations allowed. TOS violation. Read 'Forum Basics' Located top of the page. Thank you, -M. Penick This message has been edited. Last edited by: pipedreamsandbabies, Fri 24 April 2009 03:47 PM
